targets.expr: (bdb_big_fetch_ram{bdb="$bdb", cluster="$cluster"} + bdb_big_write_ram{bdb="$bdb", cluster="$cluster"} + bdb_big_del_ram{bdb="$bdb", cluster="$cluster"}) / (bdb_big_fetch_flash{bdb="$bdb", cluster="$cluster"} + bdb_big_write_flash{bdb="$bdb", cluster="$cluster"} + bdb_big_del_flash{bdb="$bdb", cluster="$cluster"} + bdb_big_fetch_ram{bdb="$bdb", cluster="$cluster"} + bdb_big_write_ram{bdb="$bdb", cluster="$cluster"} + bdb_big_del_ram{bdb="$bdb", cluster="$cluster"}) > 0

panels.description: Positive is RAM, Negative is Flash
panels.title: RAM:Flash access ratio

panels.description: Positive is RAM, Negative is Flash
panels.title: RAM:Flash access ratio
BDB sum redis wait busy key / $aggregation
BDB sum redis big inst avg read io queue
BDB sum redis big inst avg write io queue

targets.legendFormat: objects in flash (sum of all master shards)
objects in ram (sum of all master shards)

average slave shard % values in RAM
lowest master shard % values in RAM - redsi:{{redis}}
lowest slave shard % values in RAM - redsi:{{redis}}

lowest number of values in ram per master shard

targets.expr: topk(1, min(max(redis_bigdb0_ram{bdb="$bdb",cluster="$cluster",role="slave"} or redis_bigdb_ram{bdb="$bdb",cluster="$cluster",role="slave"}) by (redis,bdb,cluster) < on(cluster,bdb,redis) redis_db0_keys{bdb="$bdb",cluster="$cluster",role="slave"} ) by (bdb, redis) * -1) * -1
targets.legendFormat: lowest number of values in ram per slave shard - redis:{{redis}}

targets.expr: topk(1, min(max(redis_bigdb0_ram{bdb="$bdb",cluster="$cluster",role="master"} or redis_bigdb_ram{bdb="$bdb",cluster="$cluster",role="master"}) by (redis,bdb,cluster) < on(cluster,bdb,redis) redis_db0_keys{bdb="$bdb",cluster="$cluster",role="master"}) by (bdb, redis) * -1) * -1
targets.legendFormat: lowest number of values in ram per master shard  - redis:{{redis}}
